<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">EXHIBIT 10.5<BR>
FOIA Confidential Treatment Requested
</DIV>


<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">Execution Version
</DIV>








<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">(b)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>the actions or omissions of Toshiba, its Affiliates or its or their respective employees,
directors, agents or representatives (other than in connection with the operation of the Y4
Facility or Other Y4 Facilities), for which Toshiba shall be solely responsible; <I>provided
however</I>, that Toshiba shall have no indemnification obligation under this Section&nbsp;5.2(b) to
the extent that any Environmental Costs result from, arise out of or otherwise occur by virtue
of actions or omissions of SanDisk, its Affiliates or its or their respective employees,
directors, agents or representatives, for which SanDisk shall be solely responsible;</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">(c)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>from the operations of the Y4 Facility or Other Y4 Facilities after the FA Termination Date
(unless SanDisk is the Buyer for purposes of Section&nbsp;5.3, in which case this Section&nbsp;5.2(c)
shall not apply); or</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">(d)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>environmental conditions existing before Closing at Area #3, to the extent of contractual
rights (including to indemnification), claims or defenses of Toshiba against Yokkaichi City or
other lessors to Toshiba of Area #3 (&#147;<U>Third Party Property Indemnity</U>&#148;) that are
actually enjoyed by Toshiba (and to the extent SanDisk bears its pro rata share in exercising
any such rights, claims or defenses) and further provided that, in the event such Third Party
Property Indemnity is not assignable or otherwise available for the direct benefit of SanDisk,
Toshiba shall exercise reasonable efforts to obtain the benefits of such Third Party Property
Indemnity for SanDisk (with any associated costs of exercising such rights to be borne pro
rata by SanDisk).</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">5.3</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U>Buyer Indemnity</U>. If either of Toshiba or SanDisk (as &#147;<U>Buyer</U>&#148;) acquires the
interests of the other (as &#147;<U>Seller</U>&#148;) in the Company, the Y4 Facility and Other Y4
Facilities (whether through acquiring its Shares in the Company, by an asset sale and
liquidation or by other means), then, subject to Section&nbsp;7, Buyer shall indemnify Seller and
its Indemnified Parties from any environmental costs, expenses or liability of Seller
resulting from, arising out of or otherwise by virtue of, operations of the Y4 Facility and
Other Y4 Facilities after the FA Termination Date. However, Buyer shall have no
indemnification obligation under this Section&nbsp;5.3 to the extent that any Seller environmental
costs, expenses or liabilities result from, arise out of or otherwise by virtue of actions or
omissions of Seller, its Affiliates or its or their respective employees, directors, agents or
representatives.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">5.4</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U>Control by Indemnifying Party</U>.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">(a)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The indemnifying Party under Section&nbsp;5.2 or 5.3 shall have the sole right to control the
defense of any claim and the method and scope of remediation with respect to which the
indemnified Party seeks indemnification, provided that the indemnifying Party shall not enter
into any settlement that would materially affect the operations of the indemnified Party at
the Yokkaichi Facility unless the indemnified Party has granted its prior written consent.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->6<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">EXHIBIT 10.5<BR>
FOIA Confidential Treatment Requested
</DIV>


<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">Execution Version
</DIV>




<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt"><TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">



</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">(b)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The Parties shall cooperate in good faith to seek to agree upon the means of joint defense of
any third party claim giving rise to Covered Environmental Costs (with any disagreement to be
resolved by the mediation and arbitration provisions set forth in <U>Appendix&nbsp;A</U>)</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">5.5</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U>Liability Limit</U>. Neither Party&#146;s aggregate liability for Covered Environmental Costs
or indemnification obligations under Sections&nbsp;5.1, 5.2 and 5.3 shall exceed the greater of
US$5&nbsp;million or the aggregate purchase price of Y4 NAND Flash Memory Products by such Party
from the Company during the six years prior to the date of the applicable claim (or in the
case of liability arising after the FA Termination Date, for the six year period immediately
preceding the FA Terminate Date).</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left"><B>6.</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><FONT style="font-variant: SMALL-CAPS"><B>Satisfaction of Indemnification Obligations.</B></FONT></TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">6.1</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U>Prompt Payment</U>. Each Party shall promptly pay its 50% share of any Covered
Environmental Costs paid by the Company or by the other Party in excess of its obligation to
bear 50% of the Covered Environmental Costs. In principle, Toshiba and SanDisk shall bear
their respective 50% shares of any given Covered Environmental Costs via adjustments to the
purchase prices they pay Company for Y4 NAND Flash Memory Products, pursuant to the applicable
FA Master Operative Documents. The Parties shall discuss in good faith the means and the
timing of payment of their respective 50% share of Covered Environmental Costs, taking into
account when the Covered Environmental Costs are paid by the Company or by the other Party and
the amount of such Covered Environmental Costs. To the extent the obligations of either Party
will not be timely or fully retired by wafer price increases, the Parties shall directly pay
their respective 50% share of Covered Environmental Costs.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">6.2</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U>Action in the Name of the Company</U>. Either Party making a demand for indemnification
or contribution pursuant to this Agreement shall be entitled, notwithstanding anything to the
contrary in the FA Master Agreement or the FA Operating Agreement, to cause the Company to
make such demand, if doing so is appropriate to fulfill the intent of this Section&nbsp;6 (e.g., if
the Company has borne the Covered Environmental Costs and the claiming Party has already
reimbursed the Company 50% of the same).</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left"><B>7.</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><FONT style="font-variant: SMALL-CAPS"><B>Post Termination Environmental Costs and Exit Environmental Report. </B></FONT></TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">7.1</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U>Environmental Costs Paid Post Termination</U>. Except as otherwise set forth in this
Section&nbsp;7, the Parties&#146; obligations under Section&nbsp;5.1 shall expire as of the FA Termination
Date:</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">(a)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>In respect of Environmental Costs for remediation, to the extent the Exit Environmental
Report (as defined below) identifies contamination at the Y4 Facility or Other Y4 Facilities
and a good faith claim concerning shared responsibility for such remediation costs is made by
one of the Parties before the FA Termination Date, any obligations of the Parties under
Section&nbsp;5.1(a) (subject to Section&nbsp;5.1(b)) in respect of remediation of</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">

    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>In respect of Covered Environmental Costs resulting from a bona fide third party claim, the
Parties obligations under Section&nbsp;5.1(a) (subject to Section&nbsp;5.1(b)) shall
survive&#091;<SUP style="font-size: 85%; vertical-align: text-top">*</SUP>&#093;.</TD>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">7.2</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U>Exit Environmental Report</U>.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">(a)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Promptly upon (i)&nbsp;the exercise by either Party of any right under the FA Operating Agreement
and/or the FA Master Agreement to acquire the Shares of the other Party in the Company, to
sell its Shares in the Company to the other Party or to cause the dissolution of the Company,
or (ii)&nbsp;entering into any letter of intent or agreement for the sale of the Y4 Facility, Other
Y4 Facilities or all or substantially all of the assets (leased or owned) of the Company, the
Parties shall engage an environmental consultant from an internationally recognized
environmental investigation firm that has experience in Japan and that is mutually acceptable
to the Parties (the &#147;<U>Exit Consultant</U>&#148;) to conduct and complete Phase I and Phase II
investigations of the Y4 Facility and Other Y4 Facilities as of a date as close as practicable
to but in any event in advance of the FA Termination Date. Toshiba shall facilitate the Exit
Consultant&#146;s access to the Yokkaichi Facility as reasonably necessary to conduct such
investigations.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">(b)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The Exit Consultant shall be directed to prepare a draft report based on its Phase I and
Phase II investigations and to deliver the draft report to SanDisk and Toshiba (and if either
so directs, to any environmental consultant either Party has engaged for its own account).
SanDisk and Toshiba, directly and/or through their respective consultants, shall have 60&nbsp;days
from receipt to comment on the draft report (any such comment shall be delivered both to the
Exit Consultant and the other Party and any consultant it engages for its own account). The
Exit Consultant shall then be directed to issue to the Parties its final report (the &#147;<U>Exit
Environmental Report</U>&#148;), which shall be final and binding on the Parties.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">(c)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Covered Environmental Costs arising from the Exit Environmental Report process shall be
payable as provided in Section&nbsp;6.1.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">

    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Unless all payments due for Covered Environmental Costs in connection with the Exit
Environmental Report process have been made before the FA Termination Date, the Buyer shall be
entitled to withhold from the purchase price payable (or distributable) to</TD>
</TR>

    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">8.1</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U>Survival</U>. Sections&nbsp;5, 6, 7 and 8 and <U>Appendix&nbsp;A</U> shall survive the
termination or expiration of this Agreement.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">8.2</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U>Entire Agreement</U>. This Agreement, together with the exhibits, schedules, appendices
and attachments thereto, constitutes the agreement of the Parties to this Agreement with
respect to the subject matter hereof and supersedes all prior written and oral agreements and
understandings with respect to such subject matter.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">8.3</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U>Effective Time of Agreement</U>. Notwithstanding the effective date of this Agreement
first written above, SanDisk&#146;s indemnification obligations hereunder shall not become
effective until its Consultant has completed its Phase II soil sampling of the proposed site
of the Y4 Facility. SanDisk shall use its best efforts to cause its Consultant to complete
such sampling on an expedited basis, with a goal of completion on or before June&nbsp;30, 2006, and
Toshiba shall take all steps necessary to ensure that SanDisk&#146;s Consultant is granted timely
access to the entire proposed site of the Y4 Facility (taking into account measures to avoid
adverse effects to the manufacturing operations of the Yokkaichi Facility) to complete such
Phase II soil sampling within such period.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">8.4</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U>Governing Law</U>. This Agreement shall be governed and construed as to all matters
including validity, construction and performance by and under the substantive laws of Japan.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">8.5</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U>Dispute Concerning Prudent Operator Standard</U>. Notwithstanding anything to the
contrary in Section&nbsp;2.5 of <U>Appendix&nbsp;A</U>, if the Parties are not able to agree upon what
application of the Prudent Operator Standard requires with respect to any given proposed
remediation hereunder, at the request of either of them they shall engage a neutral and
independent environmental consultant acceptable to both Parties (the &#147;<U>Independent
Consultant</U>&#148;) to facilitate resolution of such dispute. The Parties (and at the option of
each of them their own environmental consultants) shall meet and discuss the matter with the
Independent Consultant and seek in good faith to resolve the dispute. If the Parties</TD>
</TR>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>are not able to resolve the dispute within 60&nbsp;days after initiating discussions with the
Independent Consultant, then at any time after such 60&nbsp;day period either Party may bring an
arbitration claim pursuant to Section&nbsp;2.5 of <U>Appendix&nbsp;A</U> to resolve the dispute
concerning application of the Prudent Operator Standard.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">8.6</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U>Assignment</U>. Neither party hereto may transfer this Agreement or any of its rights
hereunder (except for any transfer to an Affiliate or in connection with a merger,
consolidation or sale of all or substantially all the assets or the outstanding securities of
such party, which transfer shall not require any consent of the other party) without the prior
written consent of the other party hereto (which consent may be withheld in such other party&#146;s
sole discretion), and any such purported transfer without such consent shall be void.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-10.6
<SEQUENCE>7
<FILENAME>f24678exv10w6.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EXHIBIT 10.6
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
<TITLE>exv10w6</TITLE>
</HEAD>
<BODY bgcolor="#FFFFFF">
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>
<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">EXHIBIT 10.6<BR>
FOIA Confidential Treatment Requested
</DIV>


<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">Execution Version
</DIV>


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt"><B>PATENT INDEMNIFICATION AGREEMENT</B>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">This PATENT INDEMNIFICATION AGREEMENT, dated and effective as of July&nbsp;7, 2006, is entered into by
and among, on one side, Toshiba Corporation, a Japanese corporation (&#147;<U>Toshiba</U>&#148;), and, on
the other side, SanDisk Corporation, a Delaware corporation (&#147;<U>SanDisk Corporation</U>&#148;), and
SanDisk &#091;<SUP style="font-size: 85%; vertical-align: text-top">*</SUP>&#093;and SanDisk together with Toshiba, the &#147;<U>Parties</U>&#148;).
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS, Toshiba and SanDisk are parties to that certain Flash Partners II Master Agreement,
dated as of the date hereof (the &#147;<U>Master Agreement</U>&#148;);
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#091;*&#093;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS, recognizing that the products SanDisk will acquire from the Company will have been
manufactured using Toshiba patents and technology, and recognizing that SanDisk, as an owner of the
equity interests in the Company, will benefit from Toshiba&#146;s making available its patents and
technology to the Company, the Parties have determined to enter into this Agreement, which is
required by the Master Agreement.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;NOW, THEREFORE, the Parties agree as follows:
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left"><B>1.</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><FONT style="font-variant: SMALL-CAPS"><B>Indemnification.</B></FONT></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">1.1</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U>Patent Infringement</U>. With regard to any and all sales of Y4 NAND Flash
Memory Products by the Company to SanDisk (&#147;<U>Company Products</U>&#148;):</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">(a)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Subject to the terms and conditions listed below, Toshiba agrees to indemnify and
defend SanDisk in any legal proceeding, lawsuit or other judicial action, &#091;*&#093;claims that the
Company Products supplied by the Company infringe any &#091;*&#093; patent(s). With regard to any claim
of patent infringement for which Toshiba has indemnification obligations hereunder, Toshiba&#146;s
obligations are subject to the following conditions:</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">(i)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>SanDisk shall notify Toshiba in writing of such claim &#091;*&#093;;<U> </U></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">(ii)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>SanDisk shall also notify Toshiba, in writing &#091;*&#093;;</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">(iii)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>SanDisk shall provide Toshiba with notice of any other written communication
indicating potential patent infringement claims against the Company Products &#091;*&#093;;
<U>provided</U>, <U>however</U>, SanDisk&#146;s failure to provide such notice shall in no
way constitute a breach of this Agreement by SanDisk nor in any way excuse Toshiba&#146;s
obligations under this Agreement;</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">(iv)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&#091;*&#093;, Toshiba shall have the sole and exclusive control of the defense or
settlement</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>


<DIV align="left">
<DIV style="font-size: 3pt; margin-top: 16pt; width: 18%; border-top: 1px solid #000000">&nbsp;</DIV>
</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">
<TR>
    <TD width="3%"></TD>
    <TD width="1%"></TD>
    <TD width="96"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top">
    <TD nowrap align="left"><SUP style="font-size: 85%; vertical-align: text-top">*</SUP></TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Indicates that certain information
contained herein has been omitted and filed separately with the Securities and
Exchange Commission. Confidential treatment has been requested with respect to
the omitted portions.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>


<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->1<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">






<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">EXHIBIT 10.6<BR>
FOIA Confidential Treatment Requested
</DIV>


<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">Execution Version
</DIV>


<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left"><B></B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>of such claim, &#091;*&#093;; and</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">(v)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>SanDisk shall provide all reasonable assistance in defending such claim.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">(b)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Notwithstanding the foregoing, Toshiba shall not be obligated to indemnify or defend
SanDisk in the event that such infringement arises from:</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">(i)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&#091;<SUP style="font-size: 85%; vertical-align: text-top">*</SUP>&#093;;</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">(ii)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&#091;*&#093;</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">(iii)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&#091;*&#093;</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">(c)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&#091;*&#093;</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">(d)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&#091;*&#093;</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">(e)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>In addition to the obligations set forth above, should any third party patent claim
result in a temporary or permanent injunction against the manufacture, use, sale, offer for
sale, importation or otherwise disposal of the Company Products by SanDisk, Toshiba shall use
best efforts to undertake one of the following actions:</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">(i)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&#091;*&#093;</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">(ii)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&#091;*&#093;</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">(f)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The total cumulative liability of Toshiba under this Agreement, exclusive of the
remedy set forth in subparagraph (e), above, shall be limited to an amount not to exceed the
greater of (x) &#091;*&#093;or (y) &#091;*&#093;.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">1.2</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U>Qualifying Claims</U>.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">(a)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>If either Party receives a notice of a &#091;*&#093; or becomes aware that the Company has
received such a notice, it shall promptly notify the other Party. Promptly following the
notified Party&#146;s receipt of such notice from the notifying Party, the Parties shall meet and
discuss in good faith whether and how &#091;*&#093;, in accordance with the principles set forth in
Section&nbsp;1.2(b).</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">(b)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>In discussing and evaluating each &#091;*&#093;, Toshiba and SanDisk shall discuss and agree
upon &#091;*&#093;.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">(c)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>If despite their good faith efforts the Parties are not able to agree upon &#091;*&#093;
pursuant to</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>


<DIV align="left">
<DIV style="font-size: 3pt; margin-top: 16pt; width: 18%; border-top: 1px solid #000000">&nbsp;</DIV>
</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">
<TR>
    <TD width="3%"></TD>
    <TD width="1%"></TD>
    <TD width="96"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top">
    <TD nowrap align="left"><SUP style="font-size: 85%; vertical-align: text-top">*</SUP></TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Indicates that certain information
contained herein has been omitted and filed separately with the Securities and
Exchange Commission. Confidential treatment has been requested with respect to
the omitted portions.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>


<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->2<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Section&nbsp;1.2(b) for &#091;*&#093;, the matter shall be resolved in accordance with the dispute
resolution procedures set forth in the Master Agreement.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>

<TR>

    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>This Agreement shall terminate &#091;<SUP style="font-size: 85%; vertical-align: text-top"><FONT style="font-family: Symbol">&#042;</FONT></SUP>&#093;, and upon such termination, this
Agreement shall be of no further force and effect, and Toshiba and SanDisk shall thereafter
have no liability hereunder.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left"><B>3.</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><FONT style="font-variant: SMALL-CAPS"><B>miscellaneous </B></FONT></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>

    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">3.1</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U>Certain Definitions and Interpretive Rules</U>.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">(a)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>As used herein, the term &#147;<U>Agreement</U>&#148; means this Patent Indemnification
Agreement together with any exhibits, schedules, appendices and attachments hereto.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">(b)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Capitalized terms used but not defined in the main body of this Agreement shall have
the respective meanings assigned to them in attached <U>Appendix&nbsp;A</U>. If any capitalized
term used in this Agreement is not defined in either the main body of this Agreement or
<U>Appendix&nbsp;A</U>, it shall have the meaning assigned to it in the Master Agreement.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>

conditions set forth in <U>Appendix&nbsp;A</U> shall apply to this Agreement.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">3.2</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&#091;*&#093;</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">(a)</TD>

Article&nbsp;III shall survive and shall apply with respect to this Agreement following

    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>

    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U>Assignment</U>. Neither Party shall transfer, or grant or permit to exist any
Lien (except Permitted Liens) on, this Agreement or any of its rights hereunder, (except for
any transfer to an Affiliate or in connection with a merger, consolidation or sale of all or
substantially all the assets or the outstanding securities of such Party, which transfer shall
not require any consent of the other Party) without the prior written consent of the other
Party (which consent may be withheld in each such other Party&#146;s sole discretion), and any such
purported transfer or Lien without such consent shall be void. &#091;<SUP style="font-size: 85%; vertical-align: text-top">*</SUP>&#093;.</TD>

matters including validity, construction and performance by and under the substantive laws of
the State of California.</TD>

</DOCUMENT>
<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-10.8
<SEQUENCE>8
<FILENAME>f24678exv10w8.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EXHIBIT 10.8
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
<TITLE>exv10w8</TITLE>
</HEAD>
<BODY bgcolor="#FFFFFF">
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>
<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">EXHIBIT 10.8<BR>
&#091;Execution Copy&#093;
</DIV>


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt"><B>Guarantee Agreement</B>
</DIV>


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt">September&nbsp;22, 2006
</DIV>


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt">SanDisk Corporation
</DIV>


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt">Toshiba Finance Corporation
</DIV>


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt">SMBC Leasing Company, Limited
</DIV>

</DIV>
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>
<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">
<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio --> - 2 - <!-- /Folio -->



<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt">Guarantee Agreement
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SanDisk Corporation (the &#147;Guarantor&#148;) and Toshiba Finance Corporation and SMBC Leasing
Company, Limited as SD Lessor (in such capacity, collectively, the &#147;SD Lessors&#148;) hereby enter into
this guarantee agreement (the &#147;Agreement&#148;) with respect to the Master Lease Agreement
(<I>Honken-Lease-Keiyaku</I>) dated September&nbsp;22, 2006 and the related individual agreements entered into
thereunder (collectively, the &#147;Lease Agreement&#148;), in each case entered into by and between the SD
Lessors, SMBC Leasing Company, Limited as SD Lessor Manager, and Toshiba Finance Corporation,
Sumisho Lease Co., Ltd., Fuyo General Lease Co., Ltd., Tokyo Leasing Co., Ltd., STB
Leasing Co., Ltd., and IBJ Leasing Company, Limited as Toshiba Lessor thereunder (in
such capacity, collectively, the &#147;Toshiba Lessors&#148;), IBJ Leasing Company, Limited as Toshiba Lessor
Manager, and Flash Partners Yugen Kaisha (the &#147;Lessee&#148;).
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Unless as otherwise specified in this Agreement, the words defined in the Lease Agreement
shall have the same meaning in this Agreement.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">Article&nbsp;1. (Guarantee)
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Guarantor shall guarantee the performance, from time to time, of the obligations subject
to the guarantee below (the &#147;Guaranteed Obligation&#148;) to the SD Lessors, jointly and severally
(<I>rentai-hosho</I>) with the Lessee (the &#147;Guarantee&#148;).
</DIV>

<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt">(Guaranteed Obligation)
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Guaranteed Obligation shall mean payment obligations of lease rental (<I>lease-ryo</I>), stipulated
loss payment (<I>kitei-songaikin</I>), purchase option exercise price (<I>konyu-sentakuken-koshikagaku</I>),
terminal return adjustment amount (<I>henkanji-choseikin</I>), break funding cost, late charges
(<I>chien-songaikin</I>), and any and all payment obligations of other amounts concerning SD Tranches in
the Individual Transactions (<I>Kobetsu-Torihiki</I>) pursuant to the Lease Agreement; provided that the
Guarantor and the SD Lessors may consult in the event of any doubt concerning &#147;other amounts&#148; as
mentioned above.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In any event, the Guarantor shall not pay any obligation concerning Toshiba Tranches, and all
amounts owing from Lessee to the Toshiba Lessors in relation to Toshiba Tranches or otherwise are
expressly excluded from the Guaranteed Obligations.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">Article&nbsp;2. (Period of Request for the Performance of Guarantee Obligation)
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event the SD Lessors demand performance of the Guarantee to the Guarantor, the SD
Lessors must make a written demand to the Guarantor for performance of the Guaranteed Obligation
which the Lessee has failed to duly and punctually perform. The SD Lessors may, upon each failure
of due and punctual performance of the Guaranteed Obligation, make demand pursuant to this Article;
any delay in making such demand will not exempt the Guarantor from the obligations under this
Guarantee.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">Article&nbsp;3. (Performance of Guaranteed Obligation)
</DIV>

</DIV>
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>
<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">
<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio --> - 3 - <!-- /Folio -->



<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">3.1</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The Guarantor shall, in the event the Lessee fails to perform all or any part of its
obligations under the Guaranteed Obligation within 10 Business Days (<I>Ginko-Eigyobi</I>) from each
due date, perform the Guarantee in favor of the SD Lessors within 20 Business Days
(<I>Ginko-Eigyobi</I>) from the receipt of the written demand from the SD Lessors.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">3.2</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>If there is any Guaranteed Obligation upon the occurrence of any Termination Event
(Kaijo-Jiyu) under the Lease Agreement, the Guarantor shall perform the Guarantee within 20
Business Days (Ginko-Eigyobi) from the receipt of the written demand from the SD Lessors.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">3.3</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>If any Termination Event (Kaijo-Jiyu) under the Lease Agreement occurs, the Guarantor may,
pursuant to Article&nbsp;26, Paragraph&nbsp;8 or Article&nbsp;26, Paragraph&nbsp;9 of the Lease Agreement, succeed
the rights, obligations and legal title of the Lessee under the Lease Agreement or the rights,
obligations and legal title of Other Guarantor (defined below) under the guarantee agreement
dated the same date hereof by and between Toshiba Corporation (the &#147;Other Guarantor&#148;) and the
Toshiba Lessors, whereupon such Termination Event (Kaijo-Jiyu) shall be deemed cured.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">3.4</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The Guarantor may not exercise the right of subrogation, prior indemnity and post indemnity
with respect to the Guarantee against the Lessee until any and all receivables of the SD
Lessors and the Toshiba Lessors against the Lessee in respect of this Agreement and the Lease
Agreement have been paid in full.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">Article&nbsp;4. (Relationship with Other Security Rights)
</DIV>


<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">4.1</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The guarantee under this Agreement shall be granted in addition to other security interests
or guarantees held by the SD Lessors in connection with the Guaranteed Obligation, and the
effectiveness of such other securities or guarantees shall not be affected by the security
interests pursuant to this Agreement.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">4.2</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The Guarantor shall not claim exemption even if the SD Lessors, in their reasonable
discretion, alter or terminate other security interests or guarantees securing the Guaranteed
Obligations, provided, however, that the SD Lessors shall give at least fifteen (15)&nbsp;days
prior notice to the Guarantor in case of such alteration or termination unless the same is
contemplated by the Related Agreements (Honken-Kanren-Keiyaku).</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">Article&nbsp;5. (Transfer of Rights and Obligations)
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The SD Lessors and the Guarantor shall not, without obtaining prior written consent of the
other party, transfer or pledge the rights and obligations under this Agreement to any third party,
provided, however, this Article shall not prohibit any assignment by the Guarantor to persons who
acquire all or substantial part of the assets, business and shares of or in the Guarantor by means
of sale, merger, acquisition or other change in management control. In addition, in each
Individual Transaction (Kobetsu-Torihiki) , (i)&nbsp;pursuant to the SD Receivables Sale and Purchase
Agreement (Honken-SD-Saiken-Baibai-Keiyaku), the SD Lessors may transfer the right
</DIV>
</DIV>
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>
<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">
<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio --> - 4 - <!-- /Folio -->


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">to demand the performance of the Guaranteed Obligation with respect to SD Tranche I-AB hereunder to
the SD Borrower (Honken-SD-Kariirenin), (ii)&nbsp;pursuant to the SD Receivables Assignment Agreement
(Honken-SD-Saiken-Jyoto-Keiyaku), the SD Lessors may transfer the right to demand the performance
of the Guaranteed Obligation with respect to SD Tranche I-C hereunder to the SD Receivables
Assignee (Honken-SD-Saiken-Yuzuriukenin) and (iii)&nbsp;pursuant to the SD Receivables Security
Assignment Agreement (Honken-SD-Saiken-Joto-Tampo-Keiyaku), the SD Borrower (Honken-SD-Kariirenin)
may transfer the right to demand performance of the Guaranteed Obligation with respect to SD
Tranche I-AB hereunder to the SD Lenders (Honken-SD-Kashitsukenin). The Guarantor hereby grants
prior consent to such transfers and agrees to cooperate with the SD Lessors in preparing and
delivering the documents requested by the SD Lessors.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">Article&nbsp;6. (Limited Recourse)
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The limitation of liability by the limited recourse provision pursuant to Article&nbsp;29,
Paragraph&nbsp;1 of the Lease Agreement shall not prevent the exercise of the rights of the SD Lessors
against the Guarantor pursuant to this Agreement, nor shall the provisions thereof affect the
performance of the guarantee obligations pursuant to this Agreement.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">Article&nbsp;7. (Modification of the Agreement)
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Agreement may not be modified except with the written consent of the Guarantor, the SD
Lessors and the Toshiba Lessors.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">Article&nbsp;8. (Governing Law)
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Agreement shall be governed by, and construed in accordance with, the laws of Japan in
every respect.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">Article&nbsp;9. (Jurisdiction)
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Any and all disputes arising out of or in connection with this Agreement shall be subject to
the exclusive jurisdiction of the Tokyo District Court.
</DIV>
</DIV>
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>
<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">
<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio --> - 5 - <!-- /Folio -->

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Guarantee Agreement shall be prepared in three counterparts and the Guarantor and the SD
Lessors shall each retain one copy hereof.
</DIV>

<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">September&nbsp;22, 2006
</DIV>

<DIV align="center">

FOIA Confidential Treatment Requested<BR>
&#091;Execution Version&#093;
</DIV>


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 14pt; margin-top: 18pt">Master Lease Agreement
</DIV>


<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">Flash memory manufacturing equipment

</DIV>

<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">September&nbsp;22, 2006

</DIV>

<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">Toshiba Finance Corporation<BR>
SMBC Leasing Company, Limited<BR>
SD Lessors

</DIV>

<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">SMBC Leasing Company, Limited<BR>
SD Lessor Agent</DIV>
<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">

Toshiba Finance Corporation<BR>
Sumisho Lease Co., Ltd.<BR>

IBJ Leasing Co., Ltd.<BR>
Toshiba Lessors

</DIV>

</DIV>

</DIV>

</DIV>

</DIV></TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="left" valign="top">(Representations and Warranties)
</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD nowrap align="right" valign="top">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="right" valign="top">26</TD>
    <TD nowrap valign="top">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>
<TR valign="bottom">
    <TD valign="top"><DIV style="margin-left:0px; text-indent:-0px">Article&nbsp;21
</DIV></TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="left" valign="top">(Covenants)
</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>

<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt">Master Lease Agreement
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Master Lease Agreement (hereinafter, &#147;the Agreement&#148;) was executed on September&nbsp;22,
2006 by and between Toshiba Finance Corporation and SMBC Leasing Company, Limited as SD Lessors
(hereinafter collectively referred to as &#147;SD Lessors&#148;), SMBC Leasing Company, Limited as SD Lessor
Agent (hereafter referred to as &#147;SD Lessor Agent&#148;), Toshiba Finance Corporation, Sumisho Lease Co.,
Ltd., Fuyo General Lease Co., Ltd., Tokyo Leasing Co., Ltd., STB Leasing Co., Ltd. and IBJ Leasing
Co., Ltd. as Toshiba Lessors (hereinafter collectively referred to as &#147;Toshiba Lessors&#148; and,
together with SD Lessors, collectively referred to as the &#147;Lessors&#148;). IBJ Leasing Co., Ltd. as
Toshiba Lessor Agent (hereinafter referred to as &#147;Toshiba Lessor Agent&#148;) and Flash Partners Yugen
Kaisha (hereinafter referred to as &#147;Lessee&#148;).
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">Article&nbsp;1 (Definitions)
</DIV>


<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">1</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Unless the context makes it clear that the term has a different meaning, the terms
in the left column below, used in this Agreement, shall have the meanings set forth in
the right column below, corresponding to the relevant terms.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV align="center">
<TABLE style="font-size: 10pt" cellspacing="0" border="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%">

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">

<DIV align="center">
<TABLE style="font-size: 10pt" cellspacing="0" border="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%">
<!-- Begin Table Head -->
<TR valign="bottom">
    <TD width="5%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="24%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="5%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="71%">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>
<!-- End Table Head -->
<!-- Begin Table Body -->
<TR valign="bottom">    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD valign="top"><DIV style="margin-left:0px; text-indent:-0px">Performance, etc.
</DIV></TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="left" valign="top">Performance, structure, design, design
specification, practical value, exchange value,
usability, sales possibility, commercial value,
durability, operability, economical efficiency,
compatibility with purpose, legality and any
other performance, function, characteristics,
value and utility of the Property</TD>
</TR>
<TR valign="bottom"><!-- Blank Space -->
    <TD valign="top"><DIV style="margin-left:0px; text-indent:-0px">&nbsp;</DIV></TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="left" valign="top">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>
<TR valign="bottom">    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD valign="top"><DIV style="margin-left:0px; text-indent:-0px">Reason for total loss
</DIV></TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="left" valign="top">Any of the following incidents that occur to
the Property or its unit component or component
part: (a)&nbsp;Loss or whereabouts unknown (b)
damage or failure, reasonably recognized by
Lessee as impossible to repair or reuse from an
economic viewpoint, which is confirmed by an
appraisal company appointed by Lessor or (c)
confiscation, expropriation or theft</TD>
</TR>
<TR valign="bottom"><!-- Blank Space -->
    <TD valign="top"><DIV style="margin-left:0px; text-indent:-0px">&nbsp;</DIV></TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="left" valign="top">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>
<TR valign="bottom">    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD valign="top"><DIV style="margin-left:0px; text-indent:-0px">Loss, etc.
</DIV></TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="left" valign="top">Losses, damage, costs, fees, handling fees,
liabilities, responsibilities, penal charges,
penalties, delinquency charges, claims and
lawsuits</TD>
</TR>
<TR valign="bottom"><!-- Blank Space -->
    <TD valign="top"><DIV style="margin-left:0px; text-indent:-0px">&nbsp;</DIV></TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="left" valign="top">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>
<TR valign="bottom">    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD valign="top"><DIV style="margin-left:0px; text-indent:-0px">Unit component part
</DIV></TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="left" valign="top">A set of each property (including subject parts
fixed to or furnished with said property)
listed by serial number separately in each loan
certificate of the Property. Provided, however,
that when a part or unit component part subject
to said individual transaction is excluded from
this Agreement, the remaining unit component
part/s shall compose unit component parts
subject to the said individual transaction
thereafter.</TD>
</TR>
<TR valign="bottom"><!-- Blank Space -->
    <TD valign="top"><DIV style="margin-left:0px; text-indent:-0px">&nbsp;</DIV></TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="left" valign="top">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>
<TR valign="bottom">    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD valign="top"><DIV style="margin-left:0px; text-indent:-0px">Bankruptcy proceedings, <BR>
etc,
</DIV></TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="left" valign="top">General term referring to bankruptcy, civil
rehabilitation or corporate reorganizations and
other bankruptcy proceedings</TD>
</TR>
<TR valign="bottom"><!-- Blank Space -->
    <TD valign="top"><DIV style="margin-left:0px; text-indent:-0px">&nbsp;</DIV></TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="left" valign="top">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>
<TR valign="bottom">    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD valign="top"><DIV style="margin-left:0px; text-indent:-0px">Toshiba group companies
</DIV></TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="left" valign="top">Toshiba Corporation and companies of which
Toshiba Corporation directly or indirectly owns
50% or more of their voting shares</TD>
</TR>
<TR valign="bottom"><!-- Blank Space -->
    <TD valign="top"><DIV style="margin-left:0px; text-indent:-0px">&nbsp;</DIV></TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="left" valign="top">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

</DIV></TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="left" valign="top">Damages or penalty or other monies (provided,

monies, Lessor, Lessee and the Lender shall

pursuant to this Agreement. Such amount shall
be calculated based on the aggregate of (1)&nbsp;the
amount calculated by the relevant Lessor
pursuant to its prescribed calculation method
pursuant to the difference between the funding
cost (shown in per annum) applicable to each
Lessor in respect of its own share of the
purchase price of the Property and the
reinvestment rate in the market of the relevant
Lessor, (2)&nbsp;the amount calculated by the SD
Receivables Assignee pursuant to its prescribed
calculation method pursuant to the difference
between the funding cost (shown in per annum)
applicable to the SD Receivables Purchaser in
respect of the claims of the purchase price of
the Property related to SD Tranche 1-C and the
reinvestment rate in the market of the SD
Receivables Assignee, and (3)&nbsp;the amounts of
the damages or penalties or other monies the
Lenders impose on the Borrowers pursuant to the
Loan Agreements in relation to the failure to
drawdown or the acceleration, etc., under the
Loan Agreements (provided however, if Lessee
has doubts about other monies, Lessor, Lessee
and the Lenders shall consult with each other).</TD>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">2</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>With respect to quoting other agreements and documents in this Agreement, if the
relevant agreements and documents are revised, added or changed after the Agreement was
initially executed, they shall mean the relevant agreements and documents after they were
revised, added or changed.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">3</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>With respect to quoting provisions in this Agreement, the provisions shall mean,
unless otherwise specially stated, the provisions of this Agreement.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">4</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>With respect to referring to parties to the related agreements to this Agreement,
the parties shall also include their successors and accredited assignees.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">Article&nbsp;2 (Transaction Structure)
</DIV>


<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">1</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Lessee and Lessor confirm that transactions listed in Attachment 1, Paragraph&nbsp;16 are
planned with respect to the Property and they are inextricably linked with each other.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">2</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Lessee confirms that Lessor has the ownership of the Property during the lease
period under this Agreement.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->- 12 -<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt"><TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">



</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">Article&nbsp;3 (Lease)
</DIV>


<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">1</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Pursuant to Master Sale and Purchase Agreement, Lessor shall receive from Lessee
each unit component composing the Property on each delivery date and, in the meantime,
shall lease said unit component to Lessee.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">2</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>A lease of the Property and each unit component under this Agreement shall exist
for each individual transaction during its lease period and it shall commence from the
issuance date of each loan certificate pursuant to Article&nbsp;4, Paragraph&nbsp;5. Except where
explicitly provided in this Agreement, a lease of the Property shall neither be cancelled
nor terminated prior to its lease expiration date.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">3</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Lessee shall pay the lease payment pursuant to Article&nbsp;7, Paragraph&nbsp;2 as
compensations for the lease under this Agreement.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">4</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Lessee shall have the right to quiet enjoyment of the Property pursuant to Article
11 and other provisions of this Agreement.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">Article&nbsp;4 (Delivery)
</DIV>


<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">1</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Lessee shall designate a scheduled date to deliver each unit component composing
the Property to Lessor pursuant to Attachment 1, Paragraph and Lessee shall submit to
Lessor the request for lease and approval in the form of Attachment 2 at least five (5)
bank business days prior to the scheduled delivery date. Lessor shall confirm and agree
on the contents and conditions of the request for lease and approval received from
Lessee, and thereupon shall deliver to Lessee the relevant request for lease and approval
after printing its name and sealing it.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">2</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Subject to the satisfaction of the conditions set forth in Article&nbsp;5, and to
receive from Lessee a unit component on each delivery date at a delivery location in
accordance with Master Sale and Purchase Agreement, Lessor shall deliver said unit
component in as is, where is condition to Lessee on the same date and at the same
location for the purpose of the leasing stipulated in the previous Article, and Lessee
shall receive said unit component from Lessor.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">3</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>If it becomes necessary to change any scheduled delivery date, Lessee shall notify
Lessor to that effect as soon as possible (at the latest by 5 bank business days prior).
Lessee and Lessor shall agree on each amount of lease payment, payment for exercise of
purchase options, Return Adjustment Fee, repayment standard fee and stipulated loss payment for
each individual transaction, based on the actual property purchase price of and delivery
date for said unit component. In such case, the agreed amount of lease payment, payment
for exercise of purchase options, Return Adjustment Fee, repayment standard fee and</TD>
</TR>


</TABLE>
</DIV>

</DIV>

referenced in the preceding paragraph. Lessee may use each unit component from such
delivery date of said loan certificate.</TD>

period in accordance with Article&nbsp;4 Paragraph&nbsp;2, Lessee and Lessor shall faithfully
negotiate a possibility of extending such delivery period.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">Article&nbsp;5 (Prior conditions regarding delivery)

before completion of delivery that Lessor waives these conditions.</TD>

</TABLE>

Lessor or Lessee to expect changes in laws, orders, notices or other legal,
administrative guidance or tax changes that, in light of the purpose &#091;of the
transaction&#093;, Lessor or
Lessee reasonably considers appropriate reasons to suspend or postpone the
execution of such transaction planned in accordance with the related agreements, or
that such transaction is illegal. (However, if Lessor or Lessee determines that an
event applicable under this Item has occurred, Lessor or Lessee shall immediately</TD>
</TR>

entirely correct as of said scheduled delivery date under existing conditions on the

AGREEMENT executed on September&nbsp;10, 2004 between the Guarantors and SanDisk
International Limited, or that this Agreement has not been cancelled, dissolved or
terminated, and that there is no such material risk to the extent known to Lessee.</TD>
</TR>

    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>

Services or Moody&#146;s Investors Service is BB- or above Ba3, respectively, as of said
scheduled delivery date.</TD>

</DIV>

other related agreements and for authorization required to carry out obligations under
this Agreement by the date of execution of this Agreement or each delivery date and, in
the meantime, shall exchange certificates of seal impression for the seals used in these
agreements (issued within three months prior to each signing), certified copy of company
registration (issued within three months prior to the day of each signing) and Articles
of Incorporation (valid as of the date of signing of this Agreement).</TD>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">Article&nbsp;7 (Payment of lease payment etc.)
</DIV>


<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">1</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Lessee and each Lessor agree that monetary claims of Lessor against Lessee in the
form of lease payment, stipulated loss payment, Return Adjustment Fee, payments for
exercise of purchase options and other payments connected to each individual transaction
under this Agreement comprise Tranche 1-A, SD Tranche 1-B, SD Tranche 1-C, SD Tranche 2
and Toshiba Tranche 1-A and Toshiba Tranche 1-B. Each Tranche regarding each individual
transaction shall consist of claims obtained by dividing such monetary claims by a rate
provided in the loan certificate for said individual transaction. Further, a specific
amount for each Tranches in the form of lease payment, stipulated loss payment, Return
Adjustment Fee and payment for exercise of purchase options for each individual
transaction shall be determined by Attachment 1, Paragraph&nbsp;3, Paragraph&nbsp;6, Paragraph&nbsp;7
and Paragraph&nbsp;9 of this Agreement and the loan certificate related to said individual
transaction.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>In addition, (i)&nbsp;claims related to lease payment, stipulated loss payment,
Return Adjustment Fee, and payment for exercise of purchase options regarding each
SD Tranche shall be attributed to only the SD Lessors (each SD Lessor holds claims
divided by the ratio of its share of the Property), and money for such claims shall
be paid only to the SD Lessors, and (ii)&nbsp;claims related to lease payment, stipulated
loss payment, Return Adjustment Fee, payment for exercise of purchase options
regarding each Toshiba Tranche shall be attributed to only the Toshiba Lessors (each
Toshiba Lessor holds claims divided by the ratio of its share of the Property), and
money for such claims shall be paid only to the Toshiba Lessors.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">2</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Lessee shall, for each individual transaction, make a lease payment to Lessor for
the lease payment calculation period that ends on each payment date by 11 am on such
payment date.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">3</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>In the event that the day that Lessee is supposed to make payment in any amount
that Lessee has payment obligations for each individual transaction under this Agreement
on a day other than a bank business day, with respect to such lease payment, stipulated
loss payment, Return Adjustment Fee, and payment for exercise of purchase options, Lessee
shall make payment on the following bank business day (if the following bank business
day falls in next month, then use the previous bank business day shall apply). With
respect to the lease payments, such payment amount shall be adjusted accordingly. With
respect to other payments, payments shall be made on the following bank business day and
such payments shall not be adjusted.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->- 16 -<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt"><TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">



</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">4</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The amount that Lessee owes under this Agreement shall be paid according to
provisions set forth in Attachment 1, Paragraph&nbsp;10(2), unless as otherwise agreed by the
parties concerned. However, lease payment, stipulated loss payment, payment for exercise
of purchase options and Return Adjustment Fee, Break Funding Cost and the related late
fees thereto due under this Agreement regarding each SD Tranche shall be paid to the SD
Borrower, and lease payment, stipulated loss payment, payment for exercise of purchase
options and Return Adjustment Fee, Break Funding Cost, and the related late fees thereto
due under this Agreement regarding each Toshiba Tranche shall be paid to the Toshiba
Borrower, in accordance with Attachment 1, Paragraph&nbsp;10(1). Lessee confirms that in
connection with receiving said payments into the bank account of the Borrowers, the SD
Lessors and the SD Receivables Assignee have delegated to the SD Borrower, and the
Toshiba Lessors have delegated to the Toshiba Borrower, and each Borrower has accepted
such delegations. If such delegation is terminated by prior written notice by the SD
Lessors, the SD Receivables Assignee or Toshiba Lessors to the SD Borrower or the Toshiba
Borrower, Lessor shall notify Lessee to that effect by at least one bank business day
prior to the first lease payment due date after such termination. (In such case, with
respect to lease payment, stipulated loss payment, payment for exercise of purchase
options and Return Adjustment Fee, Break Funding Cost and the related late fees thereto
due under this Agreement, the amount with respect to SD Tranches 1-AB shall be paid in
the bank account of each SD Lender provided in Attachment 1, Paragraph&nbsp;10(2); the amount
with respect to SD Tranche 1-C shall be paid in the bank account of the SD Receivables
Assignee provided in Attachment 1, Paragraph&nbsp;10(2); the amount with respect to Toshiba
Tranches 1-AB shall be paid in the bank account of each Toshiba Lender provided in
Attachment 1, Paragraph&nbsp;10(2); the amount with respect to SD Tranche 2 shall be paid in
the bank account of each SD Lessor provided in Attachment 1, Paragraph&nbsp;10(2); and the
amount with respect to Toshiba Tranche 2 shall be paid in the bank account of each
Toshiba Lessor provided in Attachment 1, Paragraph&nbsp;10(2).).</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">5</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Pursuant to this Agreement, Lessee is obliged to pay Lessor in full amount without
any deduction, offsetting or defense regardless of any reasons (except where Lessor, the
SD Receivables Assignee or the Lenders are responsible), including defective performance
etc. by the Property, obligations against the Property, infringement against use of the
Property or bankruptcy proceedings of the parties concerned. If Lessee is required by
decree to withhold tax for the applicable payment, Lessee shall make an additional
payment that is needed to ensure the amount that the receiving party would have received
should such withholding have not been necessary.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->- 17 -<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>
